text: That's just plain awesome! I  read somewhere that it's not really broken, they just have to tear it down and clean it. Places like Dairy Queen and Sonic have multiple machines and cycle the cleaning, so there's always at least one machine in operation. MD typically only have one machine per location.
I read that too! I also hear that often times they dont want to clean it or the people the night before forget to so its just “broken” till its cleaned lol
